name: Achmad Hanafy
title: Mobile & Frontend Developer
about: As an experienced Frontend and Mobile Developer, I have a proven track record in building dynamic and responsive web and mobile applications. My expertise encompasses both front-end and back-end development, enabling me to design, implement, and maintain comprehensive application solutions seamlessly

responsibilities: Led end-to-end development of iOS and Android apps using React Native
Implemented new features and revamped existing apps
Built custom React Native component library (CLI & Expo)
Integrated Unistyles for dynamic theming
Created Storybook playground for components
Partnered with cross-functional teams to deliver features on time while maintaining high-quality code standards and best practices
Work with agile methodology using Jira platform
Developed mobile apps per client specs
Implemented Figma UI designs
Integrate RESTful APIs and ensure smooth data handling within applications
Handled full mobile app lifecycle (build, test, deploy)
Published apps to Google Play & App Store
Ensure seamless functionality, performance, and user experience across devices
Work with cross-platform frameworks such as React Native and Flutter
Develop native iOS applications using Swift and UIKit
Led frontend development for web & mobile apps
Implemented workflows aligned with business needs
Collaborated on backend integration
Participated in SIT & UAT testing
Delivered feature revamps and bug fixes
Built responsive web apps with GatsbyJS, Material UI, TailwindCSS
Developed REST APIs with Node.js & Express
Managed database with TypeORM
Migrate old web application from Codeigniter to GatsbyJS
